QuizMentor Learning Roadmap 🎓

A structured guide to understanding QuizMentor - the AI-powered quiz platform with self-learning capabilities.

📚 Reading Order

Phase 1: Understanding the Vision

Start here to understand what QuizMentor is and where it’s going.

  1. Project Overview - Start here! Understand the core concept
  2. Platform Vision - The big picture and future direction
  3. Product Differentiation - What makes QuizMentor unique
  4. Competitive Analysis - Market positioning

Phase 2: User Experience & Journey

Understand how users interact with the platform.

  1. User Stories - Real user scenarios
  2. User Journey Simplified - The core user flow
  3. User Journey Architecture - Technical implementation
  4. User Journey Analysis - Deep dive into user behavior

Phase 3: Core Features

Learn about the main features and capabilities.

  1. Self Learning User Guide - The AI learning system
  2. Gamification System - Engagement mechanics
  3. Premium Design System - UI/UX standards
  4. Admin Dashboard - Management interface

Phase 4: Technical Architecture

Understand how it’s built.

  1. Production Architecture - System design
  2. Complete Self Hosted Architecture - Deployment options
  3. Authentication Design - Security implementation
  4. AI Engine Hosting Guide - AI infrastructure

Phase 5: Implementation & Testing

Learn about development practices.

  1. Implementation Status - Current progress
  2. Testing Strategy Complete - Quality assurance
  3. Testing Guide - Practical testing
  4. Testing TestID Guide - Test identification

Phase 6: Deployment & Operations

Understand deployment and running the platform.

  1. Deployment Guide - How to deploy
  2. Deployment Launch Strategy - Go-to-market
  3. Production Readiness Runbook - Pre-launch checklist
  4. Self Learning Deployment Guide - AI deployment

Phase 7: Monetization & Growth

Learn about the business model.

  1. AD Service Monetization Strategy - Revenue streams
  2. Monetization Psychology - User psychology
  3. Dark Patterns Implementation Runbook - Ethical considerations
  4. Cost Minimization Guide - Operational efficiency

Phase 8: Integration & Migration

Understand integration options.

  1. Integration Guide - Third-party integrations
  2. Integrate Existing Engine - Legacy system migration
  3. DO to Kubernetes Migration Strategy - Infrastructure migration
  4. Supabase Setup Guide - Database setup

Phase 9: Optimization & Performance

Learn about performance tuning.

  1. Quiz Optimization Summary - Performance overview
  2. Quiz Optimization Research - Research findings
  3. Quiz Optimization Flow - Implementation flow
  4. Animation Optimization - UI performance

Phase 10: Project Management

Understand the development process.

  1. Epic Management - Project structure
  2. Epic Management V2 - Updated approach
  3. Epic Management Current - Current status
  4. System Status - Live status

Phase 11: Additional Resources

Deep dives and experiments.

  1. SCDD Experiment - Development methodology
  2. Hands On Tutorial - Getting started guide
  3. Learning Guide - Educational resources
  4. Logo Brand Assets - Branding materials

Phase 12: Status & Reality Check

Current state documentation.

  1. Realistic Project Status - Honest assessment
  2. Actual Status - Current state
  3. System Status Current - Live system status
  4. Budget vs Reality Analysis - Financial reality

Phase 13: Development Logs

Track progress and decisions.

  1. DevLog - Development diary
  2. DevLog Current - Latest updates
  3. Self Learning Operational Runbook - Operations guide

🎯 Quick Start Guides

  • Quick Start Supabase - Get running fast with Supabase
  • README - Basic project information

📝 Notes

  • Documents are listed in recommended reading order
  • Each phase builds on the previous one
  • Skip sections based on your role (developer, designer, product manager)
  • Check status documents regularly for updates
